statements: SELECT * FROM seasonal_trends;
SELECT ingredient_name, availability_date FROM seasonal_trends;
SELECT availability_location, ingredient_name FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, availability_location FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_location = 'Local';
SELECT availability_date, ingredient_name FROM seasonal_trends ORDER BY availability_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT ingredient_name, availability_location FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_location = 'Farmers Market' ORDER BY availability_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT availability_location FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-01' ORDER BY availability_location
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_date < '2022-03-01' OR availability_location = 'Grocery Store' ORDER BY ingredient_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_available FROM seasonal_trends WHERE availability_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND availability_location LIKE '%Market%'
SELECT * FROM seasonal_ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, availability_month FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE availability_month = 1;
SELECT menu_name, season FROM menu_plans WHERE menu_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE availability_month BETWEEN 4 AND 6;
SELECT menu_name, ingredients_used FROM menu_plans WHERE season = 'Winter';
SELECT * FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE availability_month = 2 ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, availability_month FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE availability_month IN (3, 4, 5) ORDER BY availability_month ASC;

SELECT ingredient_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS total_usage FROM menu_plans JOIN seasonal_ingredients ON menu_plans.ingredients_used LIKE CONCAT('%', seasonal_ingredients.ingredient_name, '%') GROUP BY ingredient_name ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE availability_month BETWEEN 6 AND 9 ORDER BY availability_month ASC, ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT menu_name, season, ingredients_used FROM menu_plans WHERE season = 'Summer' AND ingredients_used LIKE '%Tomato%' ORDER BY menu_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, seasonal_availability FROM farm_to_table_ingredients WHERE seasonal_availability = 'Fall';
SELECT menu_name, chef_id FROM menus ORDER BY menu_season DESC;
SELECT chef_name, chef_specialty FROM chefs WHERE restaurant_id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_id FROM farm_to_table_ingredients WHERE supplier_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ingredient_name, seasonal_availability FROM farm_to_table_ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE 'apple%' ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT chef_name, chef_specialty FROM chefs WHERE restaurant_id = 200 ORDER BY chef_name ASC;
SELECT menu_name, chef_name FROM menus JOIN chefs ON menus.chef_id = chefs.chef_id WHERE menu_season = 'Summer' ORDER BY menu_name;
SELECT * FROM farm_to_table_ingredients JOIN menus ON farm_to_table_ingredients.ingredient_id = menus.menu_id WHERE seasonal_availability = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM seasonal_ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, season FROM seasonal_ingredients ORDER BY season DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT menu_name, menu_date FROM menus WHERE menu_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT menu_name, recipe_name FROM menus JOIN menu_recipes ON menus.menu_id = menu_recipes.menu_id JOIN recipes ON menu_recipes.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id < 5 ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT menu_name, menu_date FROM menus WHERE menu_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT ingredient_name, season FROM seasonal_ingredients WHERE season = 'Fall' ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;

SELECT menu_name, recipe_name FROM menus LEFT JOIN menu_recipes ON menus.menu_id = menu_recipes.menu_id LEFT JOIN recipes ON menu_recipes.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id ORDER BY menu_name, recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, seasonal_availability FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT menu_name, prepared_date from menus WHERE prepared_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT menu_name, recipe_name FROM menus JOIN menu_recipes ON menus.menu_id = menu_recipes.menu_id JOIN recipes ON recipes.recipe_id = menu_recipes.recipe_id;

SELECT ingredient_name, recipe_name FROM ingredients JOIN menu_items ON ingredients.ingredient_id = menu_items.ingredient_id JOIN recipes ON menu_items.item_id = recipes.recipe_id ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC, recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE seasonal_availability = 'Summer';
SELECT menu_name, prepared_date FROM menus ORDER BY menu_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE LENGTH(instructions) > 100;
SELECT menu_name, ingredient_name FROM menus JOIN menu_items ON menus.menu_id = menu_items.menu_id JOIN ingredients ON menu_items.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT menu_name, recipe_name FROM menus JOIN menu_recipes ON menus.menu_id = menu_recipes.menu_id JOIN recipes ON menu_recipes.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id;
